definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Worse than the hunger, say local leaders, is the thirst.
sentences.chinese: 但在当地头领看来，比饥饿可怕百倍的是干渴。

sentences.english: Looking at a severed head, ''he spat and wiped his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 再看一个重要的头领，“他吐了一口痰，擦了擦嘴。

sentences.english: They were hassling over who would be the head.
sentences.chinese: 他们为了争作头领而激烈地争吵。

sentences.english: It was not difficult to tell that these were the leaders of the green Martians.
sentences.chinese: 很显然他们都是这些绿火星人的头领。

sentences.english: In terms of administrative system, the role and power of the Tai Chiefs decreased.
sentences.chinese: 行政体制方面，泰人头领的地位和权力都衰落了。

sentences.english: The chief smiled, and showed me five heads fixed upon long reeds of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 头领便笑了，叫我看那串在长竹竿上的五颗头颅。

sentences.english: He was the chief of the Blood Tribe of the Kainai Balackfoot.
sentences.chinese: 他是凯乃黑脚族血部落的头领。

sentences.english: When the Trade Federation invaded Naboo, Boss Nass chose to remain uninvolved in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 当贸易联盟入侵纳布时，纳斯头领决定置身事外。

sentences.english: In matrilinear societies the real head of the family is the mother's brother.
sentences.chinese: 在母系社会中，家庭里真正的头领是妈妈的兄弟。

sentences.english: Rep Been is a member of Boss Nass's Gungan High Council.
sentences.chinese: 比恩议事是纳斯头领的冈根高级会议的一员。

sentences.english: The groups usually had a leader.
sentences.chinese: 狼的族群一般都会有个头领。

sentences.english: Three chieftans of mountain all buy and sell original fresh breeze or the artisan come from.
sentences.chinese: 原清风山三个头领都是买卖或手艺人出身。

definition: variant of 嘍囉|喽啰[lou2 luo5]
horse thief/(old) group of horse-mounted bandits
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
